printer.desc: My current 3D Printer is an Anet A8. I bought it in 2018 and heavily customized it since then. I would like to evolve to a Prusa MINI+ as my next 3D Printer.
printer.modeling: Modeling my own 3D models using Blender (since 2012) and SolidWorks
printer.slicing: Slicing and printing using Cura and PrusaSlicer
printer.controlling: Remotely controlling and monitoring using Octoprint with a Raspberry Pi 4

mods.title: Filament guide and Cables holder
mods.desc: Those 2 prints screwed on the X axis module improve filament feeding and cable organisation.

mods.title: Magnetic cooling fan holder
mods.desc: I printed this great 2 parts magnetic cooling fan holder. It provides easier access for filament change. It needed 8 tiny magnets so the 2 parts stick well.

mods.title: Printing bed adjusting screws
mods.desc: I printed those 4 enhanced adjusting screws to make fine tuning more confortable and precise than the orginal wing nuts. I put some oil so it rotates better.

mods.title: Power supply cover with power switch
mods.desc: I printed this large cover screwed around the power supply to hide its pins. I added a very useful power switch button.

functional.title: Shutter crank holder
functional.desc: A print I did to replace a broken shutter crank holder next to a window. I needed to edit the 3D model so I didn't need to replace the original screw.

functional.title: Key replica
functional.desc: A replica of a box key, it needed at least 4 prototypes to be identical to the original and fully functional, I have been using it almost daily for 2 years.

functional.title: Google Home Mini wall mount
functional.desc: A print I did to hold my Google Home Mini smart speaker on the wall, sticked using double-sided adhesive, added two Ikea Fixa pads for more stability.

functional.title: Ergonomic bottle opener
functional.desc: I printed this useful, confortable and robust bottle opener with 100% infill. I have been using it about more than fifty times and it is still brand new.

art.title: Fall Guys figurine
art.desc: An 8cm tall figurine printed in 3 parts of different colors, sticked together, the eyes are painted using a black marker

art.title: Low Poly flower pot
art.desc: I printed this fancy Low Poly flower pot that blends greatly with my other pots. I added a hole on the bottom on the 3D model for water evacuation.

art.title: Minecraft crafting table
art.desc: I printed a 40x40mm empty cube to stick a papercraft model of the Minecraft crafting table around it. Thanks to this it won't get crushed anymore.

art.title: Tiny Benchy boat
art.desc: I printed this 12mm long Benchy to test my 3D printer ability to render details at very low scale. I used a 0.25mm nozzle, it gave pretty good results.
